fragment.title: Voronoi Doodle
fragment.desc: This pattern is inspired by my fountain pen art. The pattern of cells is a Voronoi Diagram.

fragment.title: Plaid
fragment.desc: Simple plaid patterns. This one works well in 3D mode and with keyboard/manual inputs.

fragment.title: Triangle Tiles
fragment.desc: Many forums use patterns like this for default avatars. Such images were my inspiration for this project.

fragment.title: Spirals
fragment.desc: Logarithmic spirals. My friend Sarah suggested a spiral pattern, and this is what I made.

fragment.title: Wheat
fragment.desc: This pattern was loosely inspired by the shape of blades of wheat.

fragment.title: Warped Space
fragment.desc: Take a tiling of patterns and randomly warp it.

fragment.title: Normal Map
fragment.desc: Normal maps encode surface detail in a flat texture. They are used for adding artificial detail to 3D models without changing the geometry.

fragment.title: Invisible Ink
fragment.desc: This shader was inspired by my invisible ink fountain pen art.

fragment.title: Googly Eyes
fragment.desc: My co-worker Tom brought in googly eyes one day for a joke. This inspired me to make this shader just for laughs.

fragment.title: Kaleidoscope
fragment.desc: Mirrors everywhere. This shader looks really cool in 3D Mode (Try Torus + Boxy).

fragment.title: Shell
fragment.desc: the regions of this one remind me of a nautilus shell except circular instead of a spiral.

fragment.title: Mandala
fragment.desc: I enjoy drawing mandalas. This time, I decided to draw them with code!

fragment.title: Stained Glass
fragment.desc: Nested Voronoi pattern colored to look like glass. This fractal by my friend Karishma was my inspiration for how to color this stained glass.

fragment.title: Liquid Metal
fragment.desc: An experiment with Fractal Brownian Motion I learned about here.

fragment.title: Mandelbrot Set: Cycled Colors
fragment.desc: This is the first of a few variations on the Mandelbrot Set. Numberphile has a video explaining this fractal. This one reminds me of Dr. Seuss books.

fragment.title: Growing Mandelbrot Set
fragment.desc: Wait a moment and you'll see the detail grow!

fragment.title: Mandelbrot Set: Cosine Shading
fragment.desc: This is the mandelbrot with cosine coloring.

fragment.title: Julia Set
fragment.desc: The Julia set is closely related to the Mandelbrot Set. Numberphile has a video about this set, too.

fragment.title: Newton Fractal: Pop Art
fragment.desc: This is the first of four versions of the Newton Fractal. This colors each region a flat color for a pop-art effect.

fragment.title: Newton Traditional Coloring
fragment.desc: Traditionally, you color the fractal by which root was reached. This is an example of this with a twist.

fragment.title: Newton Fractal: Cosine Shading
fragment.desc: This fractal is created from Newton's Method in the complex plane.

fragment.title: Newton Mosaic
fragment.desc: This uses cosine shading + random shading by iteration count.
